description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              You will perform following tasks:
              
              - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
              
              - Daily communication with customer to solve problem
              
              - Support customer to define solution as well as trouble shooting
              
              - Work with outside data sources and API’s
              
              - Work with Australia customer to clear requirement
              
              - Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
              
              - Work on bug fixing and improving application performance
              
              - Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              The following skills are required to achieve successful performance in this position:
              
              - At least 2 year experience with development in C#, ASP.NET
              
              - Excellent attention to detail in code requirements and self-code testing skills.
              
              - Strong understanding in OOP - Software architecture, software design.
              
              - Strong English communication skills (written, presented and spoken)
              
              - Experience in using Cloud Technologies and Cloud Services (preferably Microsoft Azure and Office 365 (especially SharePoint Online) services), and/or strong ability to learn and self-learn
              
              Microsoft Power BI
              
              - Knowledge and/or strong ability to learn and self-learn
              
              - Back-end technologies – experience with some/all of the following: C#, .net. Asp.net. API development, MS SQL, etc.
              
              - Front-end technologies - experience with some/all of the following: HTML, JavaScript, CSS, angular.js.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                14 month salary
               







                annual health care
               







                summer trip & winter trip
